channel.title: Got some questions plz help wwith them :)
channel.description:
k the first one is
1. i want to know how to have a rebooter and have it reboot every hour and i wan it so when you log on on the screen will be the time until next reboot.
2. i want to now how to add amount of players to screen without get removed when you click to move your person so you see it 24/7
3. how do i make training easier

item.title: Got some questions plz help wwith them :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“twinpkk02, post:2, topic:241115”]ok first off i will answer each one.

1.) rebooter is easy, just download the file or you can take it from another server source and drag it into your’s

2.) Most server have this already, if yours does not then you might need to look in the TUT section to find out how to add it.

3.) You will need to go into the client.java and look for the giveplayer xp and change the xp rate to what you want

:)[/quote]

1.) he wasn’t asking for a rebooter, he was asking how to set an in-game timer as to when the server would reboot. I don’t know the answer to that though, i haven’t really though about that. tbh, rebooters are a waste.

2.)His server does have it, but he wants it to where the number updates itself, without moving, or making your character file update. To do that, you would have to have a counter and an update system set, but that would lag pretty bad. I’m not sure how to perform that all together.

Read full topic
item.source: Got some questions plz help wwith them :)

item.title: Got some questions plz help wwith them :)
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

ok first off i will answer each one.

1.) rebooter is easy, just download the file or you can take it from another server source and drag it into your’s

2.) Most server have this already, if yours does not then you might need to look in the TUT section to find out how to add it.

3.) You will need to go into the client.java and look for the giveplayer xp and change the xp rate to what you want

Read full topic
